Update an organizations node with a new name. The /nodes/update API accepts requests in the following format:

UpdateNodeRequest Model - Request to update the name of a node
nodeId string
The node ID of the node you want to update.
newName string
The new name for that node.
organizationId string
ID of the organization.
Example 
{
  "nodeId": "string",
  "newName": "string",
  "organizationId": "string"
}
